events.title: Development of Artificial Intelligence
events.description: Period of accelerated development of artificial intelligence and computing. Machines begin to replace human labor on a large scale.
events.impact: Set the stage for the Butlerian Jihad, creating extreme technological dependence.

events.title: Rise of Thinking Machines
events.description: Thinking machines take control of critical systems, including interstellar navigation, food production, and even political decisions.
events.impact: Created a society completely dependent on technology, leading to the loss of essential human skills.

events.title: Beginning of the Butlerian Jihad
events.description: Jehanne Butler initiates the revolt against thinking machines. The movement grows rapidly, spreading throughout the Empire.
events.impact: Marked the beginning of a war that would last decades and forever change humanity's relationship with technology.

events.title: The Great Purification
events.description: Thinking machines are systematically destroyed. Computers are banned and humanity is forced to develop alternatives.
events.impact: Created the need to develop human skills such as space navigation and mental computation.

events.title: Birth of Guild Navigation
events.description: With the destruction of machines, Guild navigators develop the ability to fold space using spices and intensive mental training.
events.impact: Established the Guild's monopoly on interstellar travel, creating economic and political dependence.

events.title: Foundation of the Corrino Empire
events.description: House Corrino establishes the Galactic Empire, centralizing political and military power under a single imperial family.
events.impact: Created the political structure that would dominate the galaxy for thousands of years.

events.title: Discovery of Arrakis
events.description: The desert planet is discovered and its importance as the only source of spices is recognized. House Harkonnen receives the fiefdom.
events.impact: Established Arrakis as the economic and political center of the known universe.

events.title: Rise of the Bene Gesserit
events.description: The Bene Gesserit order becomes a powerful political and religious force, manipulating marriages and creating the breeding program.
events.impact: Created a network of influence that extended to all noble houses of the Empire.

events.title: Birth of Paul Atreides
events.description: Paul Atreides is born, son of Duke Leto Atreides and Lady Jessica. His existence is part of the Bene Gesserit breeding program.
events.impact: Marked the beginning of events that would lead to the complete transformation of the known universe.

events.title: Transfer of Arrakis Fiefdom
events.description: The Emperor transfers the Arrakis fiefdom from House Harkonnen to House Atreides, creating a political trap.
events.impact: Initiated the conspiracy that would lead to the fall of House Atreides and the emergence of Muad'Dib.

events.title: Harkonnen Attack
events.description: Harkonnen forces, with imperial support, attack and destroy House Atreides. Paul and Jessica flee to the desert.
events.impact: Forced Paul and Jessica to take refuge with the Fremen, beginning their transformation.

events.title: Paul Becomes Muad'Dib
events.description: Paul Atreides is accepted by the Fremen and receives the name Muad'Dib. He begins training his prescient abilities.
events.impact: Marked the beginning of Paul's transformation into a messianic figure for the Fremen.

events.title: Muad'Dib's Jihad
events.description: Paul Atreides, now Muad'Dib, leads the Fremen in a jihad that conquers the Empire. Billions die in the process.
events.impact: Completely transformed the Empire's political structure and established Paul as Emperor.

events.title: Muad'Dib's Reign
events.description: Paul Atreides reigns as Emperor, but his prescient vision shows a terrible future. He becomes blind and abdicates.
events.impact: Created an empire based on prophecy and religion, preparing the stage for Leto II's reign.

events.title: Birth of Leto II
events.description: Leto II is born with complete ancestral consciousness. His mother Chani dies in childbirth, and Paul abdicates the throne.
events.impact: Marked the beginning of the longest and most transformative reign in human history.

events.title: Leto II's Transformation
events.description: Leto II merges with sandworm larvae, becoming the God-Emperor. He begins his 3,500-year reign.
events.impact: Created the most stable period in human history, but also the most oppressive.

events.title: The Great Scattering
events.description: After Leto II's death, humanity disperses throughout the universe in a mass migration known as The Great Scattering.
events.impact: Allowed humanity to avoid extinction and spread throughout the known universe.
